title: Noatak National Preserve: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Hot off the Press The National Park Service makes every effort to keep the public informed about news events, special and recurring events, projects, and accomplishments which occur within and around the units of the Park Service. Noatak National Preserve provides press releases to local newspapers, radio, and social media outlets. In addition, current and past news releases will be posted here on the park web site. For all press inquiries, contact the park by calling (907) 442-3890 or by e-mail. Check out our current news releases, as well as our news archive. Stay in Touch through Social Media Look no further! Through our Twitter account, you can stay up-to-date with the latest happenings in Kobuk Valley National Park and the Northwest Arctic Heritage Center, and further connect with the natural and cultural resources of the park. Fire in the Park For the most up-to-date information about fires in Kobuk Valley National Park, visit our Current Fire Information page.
